misuses.description: The method C1.encrypt uses a broken crypto algorithm, specifically the SSLSocketFactory.getDefault() method, which creates a socket with a weak cipher suite. This can leave the communication vulnerable to eavesdropping and tampering.
misuses.recommendation: The method should use a stronger cipher suite, such as SSLv2Hello, TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2, or TLSv1.3, by specifying the desired protocol in the SSLSocketFactory constructor.
